requirements.summary: Add a dedicated admin login link to the Layout.tsx header component that navigates to /admin when clicked
acceptanceCriteria: An admin login link is visible in the header for all users
Clicking the link navigates to the /admin route (AdminDashboard page)
The link is styled consistently with other header navigation elements
The link is accessible from all pages in the application

file_operations.description: Add an admin login link to the header navigation area, positioned near the user profile or settings section. The link should navigate to '/admin' using React Router's Link component, be styled consistently with other header navigation elements using the existing design system, and be visible to all users regardless of authentication status. Place the link between the Upload button and Login button in the desktop header, and include it in the mobile menu as well.

requirements.summary: Add an admin login shortcut link to the HomePage.tsx hero section or below it
acceptanceCriteria: A clearly labeled admin login link appears on the homepage
The link navigates to /admin when clicked
The link is visually distinct but does not dominate the hero section
The link is accessible to both authenticated and unauthenticated users

file_operations.description: Add an admin login shortcut link below the hero banner section and above the trending videos grid. The link should navigate to '/admin' using React Router's Link component, be clearly labeled (e.g., 'Admin Dashboard' or 'Admin Login'), and styled to be visually distinct using a secondary or outline button style that doesn't dominate the hero section. Position it centrally with appropriate spacing, and ensure it's accessible to all users regardless of authentication state.
